job_details.degree_required: Bachelor's degree in Business, Logistics, or a related field.

jd: From: Shalman M, Securekloud Technologies shalman.mohamed@securekloud.com Reply to: shalman.mohamed@securekloud.com Hi ,Greetings !!!This is Shalman from Securekloud !!!We do have opening for our client,Role : Business Analyst (Shipping, Marine Logistics)Location : Phoenix, AZ (Hybrid)Duration : Long-Term ContractJob Summary :We are seeking an experienced Business Analyst with a strong background in marine logistics to join our team. The ideal candidate will analyze, optimize, and improve processes related to shipping, port operations, and supply chain logistics in the marine industry.Key Responsibilities:- Analyze and document business processes in marine logistics operations.- Gather and translate business requirements into functional specifications.- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to optimize shipping and port operations.- Identify trends and opportunities for process improvement.- Develop reports and dashboards to monitor KPIs in logistics performance.- Work with IT teams to ensure system integration and data accuracy.Qualifications:- Bachelor's degree in Business, Logistics, or a related field.- Proven experience as a Business Analyst in marine logistics or shipping.- Strong understanding of marine operations, port management, and supply chain processes.- Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.- Proficiency in logistics software and data analysis tools.
